meanings.definition: A written account of one's own life.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading autobiographies of famous people.
meanings.sent2: Many students in the class wrote autobiographies for their project.
meanings.sent3: The library had a whole section dedicated to autobiographies, making her laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of autobiographies was a window into different lives.
meanings.sent5: The autobiographies on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
